tool_description: Give your users an instant and customized audio mastering solution by harnessing the power of LANDR’s industry-leading, AI-driven mastering engine and its patented machine learning capabilities. NOTE: Access API key here: https://www.landr.com/pro-audio-mastering-api
name: LANDR Mastering v1
title: LANDR Mastering v1

api_list.name: Preview_GetDownloadPath

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique id of the preview.

id.description: The unique id of the master.

downloadUrl.description: The url where the master can be downloaded.

api_list.name: Preview_GetTrackMasterStatus

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique id of the preview.

id.description: The unique id of the preview.

status.description:
The status of the preview. \
    Possible values are:\
`downloading`: The input file is being downloaded on our server.\
`processing`: the preview is still processing.\
`completed`: the preview has finished. At this point, `/preview/single/{id}/download` can be called.\
`failed`: the preview process has failed.\
`expired`: the preview has been removed from LANDR storage. At this point, calling `/preview/single/{id}/download` will return a `410 Gone`.

error.description: Gives information about the reason of the failure. The property is filled only when `status` is `failed`. It is null otherwise.

api_list.name: Master_GetTrackMasterStatus

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique id of the master.

api_list.name: Webhook_GetWebhookConfiguration
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://landr-mastering-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/webhook"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "landr-mastering-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://landr-mastering-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/webhook"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "landr-mastering-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
